Billings.Billings West High School: Billings West High School is a four-year comprehensive public high school in Billings, Montana. The school serves 1,973 with over 100 certified staff under principal Dave Cobb, associate principal Jeril Hen, and Deans Rob Bazant, Angie Gray, and Rod Gottula. Billings West's school colors are gold and black, and its mascot is the Golden Bear.
